original_text: All they asked was that we should continue to remember the poor, the very thing I had been eager to do all along.
korean_text: 다만 우리에게 가난한 자들을 기억하도록 부탁하였으니 이것은 나도 본래부터 힘써 행하여 왔노라

sentences.original_text: All they asked was that we should continue to remember the poor
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 요청한 것은 우리가 가난한 자들을 계속 기억하라는 것이었습니다

sentences.original_text: the very thing I had been eager to do all along
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 줄곧 열심히 하고자 했던 바로 그것
